Browse the source code of netbsd/external/ibm-public/postfix/dist/src/util/strcasecmp.c

1/* $NetBSD: strcasecmp.c,v 1.1.1.1 2009/06/23 10:09:01 tron Exp $ */

36#if defined(LIBC_SCCS) && !defined(lint)
37static char sccsid[] = "@(#)strcasecmp.c 8.1 (Berkeley) 6/4/93";
38#endif /* LIBC_SCCS and not lint */
39
40#include <sys_defs.h>
41#include <ctype.h>
42
43int strcasecmp(const char *s1, const char *s2)
44{
45 const unsigned char *us1 = (const unsigned char *) s1;
46 const unsigned char *us2 = (const unsigned char *) s2;
47
48 while (tolower(*us1) == tolower(*us2++))
49 if (*us1++ == '\0')
50 return (0);
51 return (tolower(*us1) - tolower(*--us2));
52}
53
54int strncasecmp(const char *s1, const char *s2, size_t n)
55{
56 if (n != 0) {
57 const unsigned char *us1 = (const unsigned char *) s1;
58 const unsigned char *us2 = (const unsigned char *) s2;
59
60 do {
61 if (tolower(*us1) != tolower(*us2++))
62 return (tolower(*us1) - tolower(*--us2));
63 if (*us1++ == '\0')
64 break;
65 } while (--n != 0);
66 }
67 return (0);
68}
